string.text: %s for Elimay
You need to find a set and bring it to medic Elimay.
I need a good set of medical tools. I can quickly patch up minor injuries, but I don't have what I need for anything more serious than a simple scalpel.
I need a good set of medical tools. I can quickly patch up minor injuries, but I don't have what I need for anything more serious than a simple scalpel.
Thank you, my friend! These tools will save many lives. Thank you again for the tools.
Find %s for Tokar
You need to bring tools to Tokar so that he can upgrade equipment.

You know, buddy, I'm actually a pretty good technician. I can fix both weapons and armor, and I even make some upgrades! Or I would, if the tools were any good. But where are you going to get them here? Maybe you could help me find a simple set?
I need a set of tools for rough work. It should contain tools and oils for working with weapons. If you can get it, I'll be grateful, I might even pay you!.. Maybe.
Great, dude! Oh, sorry, I have nothing to pay you with. But I can give you a good discount!
Find %s for Tokar
You need to bring Tokar tools for delicate work. He needs a more complete set to perform more complex equipment upgrades.
Hey, buddy, if you agree to get me a more complete set, you'll get an even bigger discount. Will you help me out, pal?
I need tools for delicate work. It should have everything I need. You'll be like a brother to me if you get it for me!

Wow, thanks a lot, man! Now I'll definitely get rich. Damn, I'll finally be successful!... If I, of course, don't miss this chance. But for now, I can't offer you anything better than a discount. Sorry, buddy.
Find %s for Tokar
You need to bring %s to Tokar. He needs a unique set to perform even more complex equipment upgrades.
Hey, if you find something worthwhile - the discount is on me!
I need calibration tools. They should have everything I need. You'll be like a brother to me if you can get them for me!

No way...! Wow, thanks a lot, man! Now I'll definitely get rich. Damn, I'll finally be successful!... If I, of course, don't miss this chance. But for now, I can't offer you anything better than a discount. Sorry, pal.
